title: [搬运] lynchyinc airship——钢铁战舰
author: nianbing
txt_content:
我想说这个地图的作者你屌爆啦！
好吧，看看介绍吧。。。。。
Thanks for all the support from you guys :D  I thought I'd bring you a special airship...  The imperial Ironclad.  After the Emperor's flagship 'The Dreadnought' was defeated in battle by Rova, The Emperor demanded a new class of airship to be created; 'The ironclad'. Reinforced with an Iron casing, and armed with two deadly rail-cannons, this ship prowls the skies, destroying all that dare cross its path.


话说我英语不好，你们将就将就吧
感谢你们的支持:D 我想给你一个特殊的飞船…… 帝国的。 在皇帝的旗舰“无畏”Rova在战斗中被击败了,皇帝要求创建一种新的飞船,“的”。钢筋与铁壳,带着两个致命的rail-cannons,这艘船徘徊在天空,摧毁一切敢交叉。



















就是这么掉渣天!!!
如何啊？？给人气呗
下载地址：我就是下载地址了

求金粒，求人气，别做伸手党！！！

replies.author: Gary。
